survey_name: Public EV Charging Station Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners about their experiences and satisfaction with public EV charging stations, including ease of use, reliability, and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if Q1 is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if Q1 is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if Q1 is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistent measurement of satisfaction levels.
